This websites acts as a catalog of useful resources on IELTS.

## IELTS Academic Test Format

| **Section** | **About** |
|:---:|:---|
| Listening* (30 minutes) | Four recorded monologues and conversations |
| Reading (60 mintues) | - Three long reading passages with tasks <br>- Texts may include diagrams, graphs or illustrations <br>- Texts are taken from books, journals, magazines and newspapers |
| Writing (60 mintues) | - Summarise, describe or explain a table, graph, chart or diagram <br>- Short eassy task of at least 250 words |
| Speaking* (11 to 14 mintues) | - Face-to-Face interview without disruptions or distractions <br>- Incldues short questions, speaking at length about a familiar topic and a structured discussion |

[Learn more](https://ielts.idp.com/bangladesh/about/which-test-do-i-take/academic)
